SELECT emb_studio_service.type_id , emb_studio.id , emb_studio.name , emb_studio.description , emb_studio.work_time , emb_studio.fee , emb_studio.studio_site , emb_studio.cover , emb_studio.province , emb_studio.city , emb_studio.district , emb_studio.longitude , emb_studio.latitude , emb_studio.contact , emb_studio.phone , emb_studio.studio_phone , emb_studio.is_stick , emb_studio.tag , emb_studio.field_c , emb_service_type.name AS tname, round( 6378.138 * 2 * asin( sqrt( pow( sin( ( #{latitude} * pi() / 180 - emb_studio.latitude * pi() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + cos(#{latitude} * pi() / 180) * cos(emb_studio.latitude * pi() / 180) * pow( sin( ( #{longitude} * pi() / 180 - emb_studio.longitude * pi() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) as distance
FROM emb_studio LEFT JOIN emb_studio_service ON emb_studio.id = emb_studio_service.studio_id left JOIN emb_service_type ON emb_service_type.id = emb_studio_service.type_id WHERE 1=1
AND emb_service_type.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tname},'%')
ORDER BY
IF (ISNULL(distance), 1, 0), distance ASC

SELECT emb_studio_service.type_id , emb_studio.*, emb_service_type.name AS tname FROM emb_studio LEFT JOIN emb_studio_service ON emb_studio.id = emb_studio_service.studio_id left JOIN emb_service_type ON emb_service_type.id = emb_studio_service.type_id WHERE 1=1
AND emb_studio.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT emb_studio_service.type_id , emb_studio.*, emb_service_type.name AS tname FROM emb_studio LEFT JOIN emb_studio_service ON emb_studio.id = emb_studio_service.studio_id left JOIN emb_service_type ON emb_service_type.id = emb_studio_service.type_id WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT emb_studio.* FROM emb_studio WHERE emb_studio.is_stick = 'RAISE' AND emb_studio.city = #{city}

SELECT emb_studio_service.type_id , emb_studio.*, emb_service_type.name AS tname FROM emb_studio LEFT JOIN emb_studio_service ON emb_studio.id = emb_studio_service.studio_id left JOIN emb_service_type ON emb_service_type.id = emb_studio_service.type_id WHERE 1=1 AND emb_studio.id = #{id}
